room_title: Escape room "Quarantine" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
room_description:
23 hours ago, the members of Project Minuteman, an elite government initiative tasked with responding to unknown infectious outbreaks, were quarantined when their lab’s isolation failsafe was triggered. Now, a system error has compromised the facility’s air supply and communications, leaving the staff trapped inside with air running out and no way to call for help.
Your mission is to enter the lab, discover the cause of the quarantine, and deactivate the system before you and everyone inside suffocate.
